name: Garden Farm Legend
description:
Here comes the most addictive and interesting matching game with exceptionally well designed puzzles in Garden Farm Legend. Swap and match 3 or more identical crops to clear the board and win awesome prizes. Start your adventure and explore a plenty of exciting and delicious worlds and levels. Pay attention with cake, stone, ice floor and wood blocks.

☆☆☆☆☆ Game Features ☆☆☆☆☆
• Amazing 240 levels of mouthwatering puzzles
• Gather more crops to make a super power blast
• Collect cakes and breads for tough levels
• Create and use powerful boosters in this wonderland
• Unlock more levels and adventures with your achievements.
• Small game size but super amazing effects

Let's take on this joy alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest scores!
